parameter.value: Ahhh, welcome |PLAYERNAME|! Say, have you already heard the latest news about the seamonster, Aneus, or the rumours in this area?
Good bye and come again for some other rumours! *waves with her hand at you*
Good bye and come again for some other rumours! *waves with her hand at you*
Good bye and come again for some other rumours! *waves with her hand at you*
